sys_script_include.name: CustomATFSteps

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_35a9d6cdff9b061019a8ffda7c4fd977
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_rptp_smartinte_0.CustomATFSteps</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>CustomATFSteps</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var CustomATFSteps = Class.create();
CustomATFSteps.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    validateResponseHeader: function(stepResult, headerName, expectedValue) {
        // Get the test step record
        var testStep = stepResult.test_step;

        // Get the response body from the previous REST step
        var responseBody = testStep.rest_response_body;

        // Parse the response body to get the headers
        var headers = responseBody.getHeaders();

        // Check if the header exists
        if (headers.hasOwnProperty(headerName)) {
            var actualValue = headers[headerName];

            // Validate the header value
            if (actualValue == expectedValue) {
                stepResult.setOutputMessage('Header validation passed.');
                stepResult.setSuccess();
            } else {
                stepResult.setOutputMessage('Header validation failed. Expected: ' + expectedValue + ', Actual: ' + actualValue);
                stepResult.setFailure();
            }
        } else {
            stepResult.setOutputMessage('Header ' + headerName + ' not found in the response.');
            stepResult.setFailure();
        }

        // Update the step result
        stepResult.update();
    },

    type: 'CustomATFSteps'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jabbar.nurbash</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-08 07:45:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>35a9d6cdff9b061019a8ffda7c4fd977</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CustomATFSteps</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SmartIntegration" source="x_rptp_smartinte_0">eeb170fcff218a1019a8ffda7c4fd91f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SmartIntegration">eeb170fcff218a1019a8ffda7c4fd91f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_35a9d6cdff9b061019a8ffda7c4fd977</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jabbar.nurbash</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-08 09:44:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
